archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0291
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a prospective customer, I want to be able to understand whats involved to connect my broadband services, so that I can decide if I want to purchase it

properties.value: different connectivity methods that are a result of an availability check can mean different installation dates, different needed actions that is needed for the customer.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
